post:
DDoS Protected Hosting Cloudcom are glad to offer the most affordable, fast and protected Virtual Private Server ever available today!

All virtual servers cost as low as 3$ per month!

Looks like the same VPS server, but is a 10x times faster.

Speed: This is where SSDs shine. An SSD-equipped Personal Computer will boot in seconds, certainly under a minute. A hard drive requires time to speed up to operating specs, and will continue to be slower than an SSD during normal use. The SSD Storage provides you the ultimate combination of the speed and and effectiveness of the virtual hosting.

Cloudcom protected Data Center functions only with the newest ssd storage technologies (SAN SSD) and the servers based on Intel processors.

Each virtual server is connected to a 10 gbps port.

We offer a DDoS protection with every VPS server for an extra fee, depending on amount of cpu cores involved (per core).
VPS Server Special:
VPS-V0 (LINUX)
2.4 Ghz Intel Xeon
1 core
512 MB ram
20 GB storage
1 TB bandwidth
10 GbE netowork
2.84 Euro monthly

https://cloudc.me
